data.title: Luis Cruz, Real Estate Agent
data.meta_description: Professional real estate agent Luis Cruz with Realty ONE Groupp
data.text:
Biography Retired Detective Luis Cruz

Retired Detective Cruz is a 25 year veteran of law enforcement he holds a bachelor's degree in Sociology and a master's degree in education. During his career he has been involved in every type of investigation from the local to the state level.

He started his career as a correctional officer at the Hudson County Correction Center for 4 years followed by 5 years as a member of the Hudson County Prosecutor's office where he worked in an undercover capacity in the Homicide sexual Assault Child abuse Narcotics and White-Collar crime units. He then finished his career at the office of the Attorney General serving as a State Detective 1 in the Insurance Fraud Auto Theft Human trafficking and Narcotics Units. His experience and expertise led to numerous arrests and he now brings his techniques to Real Estate
